mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `guo_bang_ji_lu_${qyh}` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `qyjlId` int NULL DEFAULT NULL, `gbzl` float(10, 4) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `zp1` varchar(300) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `zp2` varchar(300) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `zp3` varchar(300) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `gbzt` int NULL DEFAULT NULL, `gbsj` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `gblx` int NULL DEFAULT NULL, `ddId` int NULL DEFAULT NULL, `qytb` int NULL DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
